name: tree-view
description: Explore and open files in the current project.

tree-view.description: A tree-like view of directories and files

squashDirectoryNames.title: Collapse directories
squashDirectoryNames.description: Collapse directories that only contain a single directory.

hideVcsIgnoredFiles.title: Hide VCS Ignored Files
hideVcsIgnoredFiles.description: Don't show files and directories ignored by the current project's VCS system. For example, projects using Git have these paths defined in their `.gitignore` file.

hideIgnoredNames.description: Don't show items matched by the `Ignored Names` core config setting.

sortFoldersBeforeFiles.description: When listing directory items, list subdirectories before listing files.

autoTrackActivePane.title: Auto Select Active Pane
autoTrackActivePane.description: The Active Pane is typically the focused editor buffer

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Change the selected tree node to reflect the active pane item as it changes.

autoReveal.title: Auto Reveal
autoReveal.description: If the new tree selection is not visible, expand and scroll as needed to reveal it into view.

focusOnReveal.description: Make the `Reveal Active File` command focus the tree view after it selects and reveals the active pane item

alwaysOpenExisting.description: When opening a file, always focus an already-existing view of the file even if it's in a another pane.
